bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. I make honey for you to eat. Who am I?

hints.text: I live in a hive with lots of my friends.
I buzz when I fly.
I collect nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I'm red with black spots, and good luck is what I bring! Who am I?

hints.text: I am a small, round beetle.
Farmers like me because I eat other bugs that hurt their plants.
I have black spots on my red shell.

bug.question: I jump very high and eat lots of plants. I am green and have long legs. Who am I?

hints.text: I make a 'chirp' sound!
I am usually found in grassy areas.
I can jump many times my own height!

bug.question: I live in a hill, and I work with all my friends to carry food. Who am I?

hints.text: I am very small and strong.
I am a common insect.
I live in a colony.

bug.question: I start as a worm, then make a cozy bed, and become something beautiful that flies. What am I?

hints.text: I have big, colorful wings.
I drink nectar from flowers.
My first stage is called a caterpillar

bug.question: I fly around at night and like to eat other bugs, my name sounds like a type of mouse. Who am I?

hints.text: I am nocturnal.
Some people think I am scary
I eat mosquitoes.

bug.question: I light up the night with my bright glow. Who am I?

hints.text: I can only be seen at night.
I blink to communicate with other bugs like me.
I have a light in my tail.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs, not six. Who am I?

hints.text: I am not an insect.
I can be found in corners and on ceilings.
I spin webs to catch my food.

bug.question: I buzz and bite and can make you itch. I like to drink your blood. Who am I?

hints.text: I am a pesky flying insect.
I lay my eggs in water.
Some people get a red, itchy bump after I bite them.

bug.question: I am long and skinny and eat leaves. I get ready for a big change and make a silk home. Who am I?

hints.text: I become a butterfly or moth.
I eat leaves and grow big.
I spin a cocoon to protect myself.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and help flowers grow. What am I? üåßÔ∏è

hints.text: Farmers like me!
You need an umbrella when I come down.
I am water from the clouds.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and give you heat. What am I? ‚òÄÔ∏è

hints.text: I am in the sky during the day.
I help plants grow and keep you warm.
You need sunscreen when I'm out!

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I? ‚òÅÔ∏è

hints.text: Sometimes I look like animals.
Rain can come from me.
I am made of tiny water droplets.

weather.question: I make the trees dance and blow your hair. What am I? üå¨Ô∏è

hints.text: I can be gentle or strong.
I am invisible.
Sailboats use me to move.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I? ‚ùÑÔ∏è

hints.text: You can make a snowman with me.
I am made of frozen water.
You can have a snowball fight with me.

weather.question: I am very loud and come with lightning. What am I? ‚õàÔ∏è

hints.text: I am a loud noise after lightning.
I happen during a storm.
I sound like a big clap!

weather.question: I am a colourful arc in the sky after the rain. What am I? üåà

hints.text: I have many colours.
I am curved like a smile.
You can see me when the sun shines through the rain.

weather.question: I am tiny ice pellets that fall from the sky. What am I? üßä

hints.text: I am like frozen raindrops.
I can hurt if I hit you.
I am smaller than snowballs.

weather.question: I am a type of rain that is frozen before it hits the ground. What am I? ü•∂

hints.text: I am like rain but with ice.
I can make roads slippery.
I am not snow or hail.

weather.question: I am a swirling storm with very strong winds. What am I? üå™Ô∏è

hints.text: I can cause a lot of damage.
You should take shelter when I come.
I am a type of very strong wind.
